com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics

Class Billboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.decals.Decal
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics.Billboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Billboard
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.decals.Decal
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    An extension of Decal that is meant to simplify Billboard creation.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)
